attributes.additional_details:
I Want The Government To Unban Handguns And Semi-Auto Rifles, Because All The Good Professional Target Shooters And Hunters Are Restriced To Barely Nothing. I Think The Gun Licence Steps Are Good And Stop Criminals Geting Guns Legally.

Also The Gun Crime Rate Has Gone Up Hugely Since The 1997 Ban Of Handguns So Please At Least Consider At Least Loosening The Ban A Little.

Regards
